library: l.cdate as cdate, l.library_external_info as externalInfo, l.library_id as id, l.library_creator_id as uid, l.library_name as title, l.library_description as description, l.library_artwork as img
book: b.cdate as cdate, b.book_external_info as externalInfo, b.book_id as id, b.book_author as author, b.book_name as title, b.book_description as description, b.book_artwork as img
user: u.cdate as cdate, u.user_login as userLogin, u.user_name as username, u.user_library_id as userFavoritesId, u.user_id as userId, u.user_email as userEmail
